caption.title: Log colony forming unit (CFU) values of forming Candida albicans (CA) (ATCC MYA-2876), C. tropicalis (CT) (ATCC 750) and C. dubliniensis (CD) (ATCC MYA-646) biofilms in the presence of different concentrations of (A) Cinnamomum verum (CV) leaf oil and (B) chlorhexidine digluconate (CHL). All error bars represent the Â± 2 standard deviations (SD).
